item.title: 30 Days of AI in Testing Challenge: Day 9: Evaluate prompt quality and try to improve it
item.description: This blog post is the eighth day of the 30-day AI Testing Challenge, focusing on creating detailed prompts to support the testing activities. The post may include the author’s reflections on how to design and build prompts necessary for the testing activities, as well as insights gained during this process. By sharing detailed prompt designs, readers will be able to understand how the author uses prompts in testing activities and effectively guides AI in tasks related to testing. This series of activities is expected to provide practical examples and experiences for testing professionals applying AI testing.
